references.reason: This book provides a comprehensive overview of the theory and applications of compressed sensing, which is the foundation of the current work.
This paper introduces the idea of using generative models for compressed sensing, which is closely related to the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Sparse Bayesian learning for basis selection
references.reason: This paper introduces Sparse Bayesian Learning (SBL), a key algorithm used in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Sparse Bayesian learning and the relevance vector machine
references.reason: This paper introduces the relevance vector machine, a Bayesian method closely related to SBL used in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Regression shrinkage and selection via the Lasso
references.reason: This paper introduces the Lasso, a classic algorithm used in compressed sensing and serves as a baseline for comparison with the proposed method.
